ORDER GRANTING FOURTH STIPULATION FOR EXTENSION OF TIME FOR DEFENDANT TO RESPOND TO INITIAL COMPLAINT 18 by Judge John F. Walter. The Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence shall have until and including October 15, 2018, to answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint. (iv) (Entered: 10/04/2018)

STIPULATION Extending Time to Answer the complaint as to The Allen Institute For Artificial Intelligence answer now due 9/10/2018, re Complaint (Attorney Civil Case Opening), 1 filed by Defendant The Allen Institute For Artificial Intelligence.(Attorney Sean M Sullivan added to party The Allen Institute For Artificial Intelligence(pty:dft))(Sullivan, Sean) (Entered: 08/27/2018)
